description: Get detailed data for a deployment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment that you want to get the detailed data for.

nested_items.name: deployment
nested_items.description: The detailed data of the requested deployment.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the deployment.

nested_items.name: completedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the deployment was completed.

nested_items.name: componentName
nested_items.description: The name of the component associated with this deployment.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the deployment was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the deployment.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The deployment status message.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the environment associated with this deployment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the deployment.

nested_items.name: initialState
nested_items.description: The initial state of the target resource at the time of the deployment.

nested_items.name: component
nested_items.description: The state of the component associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: serviceInstanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service instance that this component is attached to. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service that serviceInstanceName is associated with. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceSpec
nested_items.description: The service spec that the component uses to access service inputs. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: templateFile
nested_items.description: The template file used.

nested_items.name: environment
nested_items.description: The state of the environment associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The environment spec that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the environment template that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the environment template that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the environment template that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: serviceInstance
nested_items.description: The state of the service instance associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: lastSuccessfulComponentDeploymentIds
nested_items.description: The IDs for the last successful components deployed for this service instance.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: lastSuccessfulEnvironmentDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID for the last successful environment deployed for this service instance.

nested_items.name: lastSuccessfulServicePipelineDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID for the last successful service pipeline deployed for this service instance.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The service spec that was used to create the service instance.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the service template that was used to create the service instance.

nested_items.name: servicePipeline
nested_items.description: The state of the service pipeline associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The service spec that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: lastAttemptedDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last attempted deployment.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the deployment was last modified.

nested_items.name: lastSucceededDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last successful deployment.

nested_items.name: serviceInstanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the deployment's service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service in this deployment.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target of the deployment.

nested_items.name: targetResourceCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the depoyment target was created.

nested_items.name: targetResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the deployment target. It can be an environment, service, service instance, or component.

nested_items.name: targetState
nested_items.description: The target state of the target resource at the time of the deployment.

nested_items.name: component
nested_items.description: The state of the component associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: serviceInstanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service instance that this component is attached to. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service that serviceInstanceName is associated with. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: serviceSpec
nested_items.description: The service spec that the component uses to access service inputs. Provided when a component is attached to a service instance.

nested_items.name: templateFile
nested_items.description: The template file used.

nested_items.name: environment
nested_items.description: The state of the environment associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The environment spec that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the environment template that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the environment template that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the environment template that was used to create the environment.

nested_items.name: serviceInstance
nested_items.description: The state of the service instance associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: lastSuccessfulComponentDeploymentIds
nested_items.description: The IDs for the last successful components deployed for this service instance.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: lastSuccessfulEnvironmentDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID for the last successful environment deployed for this service instance.

nested_items.name: lastSuccessfulServicePipelineDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID for the last successful service pipeline deployed for this service instance.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The service spec that was used to create the service instance.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the service template that was used to create the service instance.

nested_items.name: servicePipeline
nested_items.description: The state of the service pipeline associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The service spec that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.
